title: Never lagged in League before and this patch I am lagging with good ping?
body:
My ping is usually around 37 MS and I have been disconnecting or lagging extremely hard in game where my character just runs into oblivion and dies. I have never had this issue before. This only happens in spikes, the game plays consistently smooth and this will just happen randomly. 

Computer Specs:
3.4 GHZ Intel I7
32 GB RAM Cosair Blue Vengeance
GTX 780 GPU
WIndows 7

Internet Provider: 
Cox (East Coast) 
120 mbps down/ 12 mbps up

Client:
Beta client Patch 7.1
Playing the game in borderless, everything on high

replies.body: It sounds like you might be experiencing some packet loss, so your'e seeing delays in what's being communicated to your screen.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an overview of your case to see what's going on.  Let me know what you find!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=kTof88fJ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-01-13T22:33:58.345+0000)
>
> It sounds like you might be experiencing some packet loss, so your'e seeing delays in what's being communicated to your screen.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an overview of your case to see what's going on.  Let me know what you find!

The logs discovered major issues. I lowered the MTU on my router a bit and popped my computers IP into a DMZ and it seems to have fixed the issue. It's just odd that I wasn't having problems prior to this patch. Thanks, that is a pretty handle tool along with the Hextech Repair Tool.
